titleStmt.title: Aesop at Tunbridge, or, A few select fables in verse by no person of quality.
titleStmt.author: No person of quality.
Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by E. Whitlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Ward. cf. Harvard University Libraries.
There appear to be at least two versions of this work bearing the same imprint. This version differs in pagination and in the "To the reader."
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
